alert.note: Alert for Ellsworth (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 10 at 11:30PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CDT FOR ELLSWORTH AND WESTERN SALINE COUNTIES... At 1129 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Smolan to 7 miles southeast of Kanopolis to 5 miles south of Ellsworth, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Salina, Ellsworth, Kanopolis, Holyrood, Brookville, Smolan, Lorraine, Falun, Glendale, Kanopolis Lake, Kanopolis State Park and Ellsworth Airport. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
